abstract: Olivier Brandicourt, head of Bayer’s health care business, will have to restore growth in Sanofi’s important diabetes franchise.
snippet: Olivier Brandicourt, head of Bayer’s health care business, will have to restore growth in Sanofi’s important diabetes franchise.
lead_paragraph: The French pharmaceutical giant Sanofi on Thursday named Olivier Brandicourt, a top executive at Bayer, as its new chief executive, replacing Christopher A. Viehbacher, who was fired in October.

headline.main: After Shake-Up Last Year, Sanofi Names New Chief
headline.print_headline: After Shake-Up Last Year, Sanofi Names New Chief
